description: The ultimate objective of SeaState_cci is to develop an initial 18-year data set (2002- 2020) capitalising on the rich satellite altimeter, SAR imager, in situ and other data holdings available during that period. The focus will be on the development, testing and improvement of dedicated sea state retrieval algorithms with respect to climate users' requirements, as compiled at high level by GCOS.
title: Sea State
